BUT BECAUSE THEY FEEL BADLY IT TOOK SEW BALMA SO LONG TO DO IT.

NOTHING WAS DONE.

>> Jon: WE WERE BEGGING HIM.
TO FUNDAMENTALLY TRANSFORM AMERICA'S APPROACH TO IMMIGRATION.
LOOK HOW WE RALLIED AROUND HIM WITH THE WHOLE HEALTH CARE THING.
WE LOVE THE GUY.

NO USE NOW ON WONDERING WHAT MIGHT HAVE HAPPENED IF ONLY HE TRIED.
IT WAS DECEMBER 2010.
YES, I REMEMBER IT WELL.

PROGRESS!

HE'S PRESIDENT.

S OF THAT -- EXAMPLES OF THAT YOU WOULD HAVE GO BACK AS FAR AS --

IN MODERN HISTORY HAS CHANGED DEPORTATION THROUGH EXECUTIVE ACTION EXCEPT ALL OF THEM.

THE FACT OF THE MATTER IS THERE ARE LAWS ON THE BOOKS THAT I HAVE TO ENFORCE.

UM, WOW THAT WAS JUST NINE MONTHS AGO.
